:::Sideswipe/Orion:::

::They see him burrowing::
Sideswipe: Damn. That guy doesnt know the meaning of a fair fight.
Orion: Don't sweat it, we'll just get some other targets.
::They both look at Triggerhappy.  Sideswipe fired 25 rifle shots at 
Triggerhappy, and Orion fired 2 missles at Triggerhappy::

--part1_135.2bb427b.28f372b1_boundary
